About the Company: Kanchi Karpooram Limited (KKL)a Public Limited Company manufactures Camphor, its derivatives, Gum rosin, Value Added Resins and Fortified Rosin.Kanchi Karpooram Limited is in this arena for more than a decade with a proven track record for quality, competitive price and timely supply of its products. The main product is Camphor which has been well accepted in the market. Besides Camphor and its Derivatives, Kanchi Karpooram Limiteds other products such as Gum rosin and Rosin Derivatives, also enjoy an enviable share in the market.
